head.default: select p.partnumber, ptype.groupvalue as protype, p.description, p.unit, t.taxcode , case when p.notes is null then '' else p.notes end as notes ,  case when p.webitem=1 then '={{lb_yes}}' else '={{lb_no}}' end as webitem ,  case when p.inactive=1 then '={{lb_yes}}' else '={{lb_no}}' end as inactive from product p inner join groups as ptype on p.protype=ptype.id inner join tax t on p.tax_id=t.id where p.id = @id

fieldvalue.default: select df.description as fielddef, case when fg.groupvalue in ('bool') and fv.value = 'true' then '={{lb_yes}}' when fg.groupvalue in ('bool') and fv.value = 'false' then '={{lb_no}}' when fg.groupvalue in ('customer') then rf_customer.custnumber when fg.groupvalue in ('tool') then rf_tool.serial when fg.groupvalue in ('transitem','transmovement','transpayment') then rf_trans.transnumber when fg.groupvalue in ('product') then rf_product.partnumber when fg.groupvalue in ('project') then rf_project.pronumber when fg.groupvalue in ('employee') then rf_employee.empnumber when fg.groupvalue in ('place') then rf_place.planumber else fv.value end as value, fv.notes as notes from fieldvalue fv inner join deffield df on fv.fieldname = df.fieldname and df.nervatype = (select id from groups where groupname='nervatype' and groupvalue='product') inner join groups fg on df.fieldtype = fg.id left join customer rf_customer on fv.value = cast(rf_customer.id as char(150)) left join tool rf_tool on fv.value = cast(rf_tool.id as char(150)) left join trans rf_trans on fv.value = cast(rf_trans.id as char(150)) left join product rf_product on fv.value = cast(rf_product.id as char(150)) left join project rf_project on fv.value = cast(rf_project.id as char(150)) left join employee rf_employee on fv.value = cast(rf_employee.id as char(150)) left join place rf_place on fv.value = cast(rf_place.id as char(150)) where fv.deleted = 0 and df.visible=1 and fv.ref_id = @id

groups.default: select p.id as id, p.partnumber as partnumber, p.description as pname, g.groupvalue as groupvalue, g.description as description from product p inner join link l on p.id = l.ref_id_1 and l.nervatype_1 = (select id from groups where groupname='nervatype' and groupvalue='customer') inner join groups g on l.ref_id_2 = g.id and l.nervatype_2 = (select id from groups where groupname='nervatype' and groupvalue='groups') where p.deleted = 0 and p.id = @id

barcode.default: select  bc.code, bc.description, bt.groupvalue as barcodetype, bc.qty , case when bc.defcode=1 then '={{lb_yes}}' else '={{lb_no}}' end as defcode from barcode bc inner join groups bt on bc.barcodetype=bt.id where bc.product_id = @id

event.default: select e.calnumber as calnumber, eg.groupvalue as eventgroup, substr(cast(e.fromdate as char(10)), 1, 10) as fromdate, substr(cast(e.fromdate as char(16)), 12, 5) as fromtime, substr(cast(e.todate as char(10)), 1, 10) as todate, substr(cast(e.todate as char(16)), 12, 5) as totime, e.subject as subject, e.place as place, e.description as description from event e left join groups eg on e.eventgroup = eg.id where e.deleted=0 and e.nervatype = (select id from groups where groupname='nervatype' and groupvalue='product') and e.ref_id = @id
event.mssql: select e.calnumber as calnumber, eg.groupvalue as eventgroup, CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), e.fromdate, 120) as fromdate, CONVERT(VARCHAR(5), e.fromdate, 108) as fromtime, CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), e.todate, 120) as todate, CONVERT(VARCHAR(5), e.todate, 108) as totime, e.subject as subject, e.place as place, e.description as description from event e left join groups eg on e.eventgroup = eg.id where e.deleted=0 and e.nervatype = (select id from groups where groupname='nervatype' and groupvalue='product') and e.ref_id = @id

price.default: select p.curr, p.qty, p.pricevalue , substr(cast(p.validfrom as char(10)), 1, 10) as validfrom , case when p.validto is null then '' else substr(cast(p.validto as char(10)), 1, 10) end as validto , case when p.vendorprice=1 then '={{lb_yes}}' else '={{lb_no}}' end as vendor , case when c.custname is null then '' else c.custname end as custname , case when g.groupvalue is null then '' else g.groupvalue end as custgroup from price p left join link cl on p.id=cl.ref_id_1 and cl.nervatype_1 = (select id from groups where groupname='nervatype' and groupvalue='price') left join customer c on cl.ref_id_2=c.id and cl.nervatype_2 = (select id from groups where groupname='nervatype' and groupvalue='customer') and c.deleted=0 left join link gl on p.id=gl.ref_id_1 and gl.nervatype_1 = (select id from groups where groupname='nervatype' and groupvalue='price') left join groups g on gl.ref_id_2=g.id and gl.nervatype_2 = (select id from groups where groupname='nervatype' and groupvalue='groups') and g.deleted=0 where p.deleted=0 and p.discount is null and p.product_id = @id order by p.validfrom
price.mssql: select case when p.validfrom is null then '' else CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), p.validfrom, 120) end as validfrom , p.curr, p.qty, p.pricevalue , case when p.validto is null then '' else CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), p.validto, 120) end as validto , case when p.vendorprice=1 then '={{lb_yes}}' else '={{lb_no}}' end as vendor , case when c.custname is null then '' else c.custname end as custname , case when g.groupvalue is null then '' else g.groupvalue end as custgroup from price p left join link cl on p.id=cl.ref_id_1 and cl.nervatype_1 = (select id from groups where groupname='nervatype' and groupvalue='price') left join customer c on cl.ref_id_2=c.id and cl.nervatype_2 = (select id from groups where groupname='nervatype' and groupvalue='customer') and c.deleted=0 left join link gl on p.id=gl.ref_id_1 and gl.nervatype_1 = (select id from groups where groupname='nervatype' and groupvalue='price') left join groups g on gl.ref_id_2=g.id and gl.nervatype_2 = (select id from groups where groupname='nervatype' and groupvalue='groups') and g.deleted=0 where p.deleted=0 and p.discount is null and p.product_id = @id order by p.validfrom

discount.default: select p.curr, p.qty, p.pricevalue , substr(cast(p.validfrom as char(10)), 1, 10) as validfrom , case when p.validto is null then '' else substr(cast(p.validto as char(10)), 1, 10) end as validto , case when p.vendorprice=1 then '={{lb_yes}}' else '={{lb_no}}' end as vendor , case when c.custname is null then '' else c.custname end as custname , case when g.groupvalue is null then '' else g.groupvalue end as custgroup , case when cm.groupvalue is null then '' else cm.groupvalue end as calcmode , p.discount from price p inner join groups cm on p.calcmode=cm.id left join link cl on p.id=cl.ref_id_1 and cl.nervatype_1 = (select id from groups where groupname='nervatype' and groupvalue='price') left join customer c on cl.ref_id_2=c.id and cl.nervatype_2 = (select id from groups where groupname='nervatype' and groupvalue='customer') and c.deleted=0 left join link gl on p.id=gl.ref_id_1 and gl.nervatype_1 = (select id from groups where groupname='nervatype' and groupvalue='price') left join groups g on gl.ref_id_2=g.id and gl.nervatype_2 = (select id from groups where groupname='nervatype' and groupvalue='groups') and g.deleted=0 where p.deleted=0 and p.discount is not null and p.product_id = @id order by p.validfrom
discount.mssql: select case when p.validfrom is null then '' else CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), p.validfrom, 120) end as validfrom , p.curr, p.qty, p.pricevalue , case when p.validto is null then '' else CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), p.validto, 120) end as validto , case when p.vendorprice=1 then '={{lb_yes}}' else '={{lb_no}}' end as vendor , case when c.custname is null then '' else c.custname end as custname , case when g.groupvalue is null then '' else g.groupvalue end as custgroup , case when cm.groupvalue is null then '' else cm.groupvalue end as calcmode , p.discount from price p inner join groups cm on p.calcmode=cm.id left join link cl on p.id=cl.ref_id_1 and cl.nervatype_1 = (select id from groups where groupname='nervatype' and groupvalue='price') left join customer c on cl.ref_id_2=c.id and cl.nervatype_2 = (select id from groups where groupname='nervatype' and groupvalue='customer') and c.deleted=0 left join link gl on p.id=gl.ref_id_1 and gl.nervatype_1 = (select id from groups where groupname='nervatype' and groupvalue='price') left join groups g on gl.ref_id_2=g.id and gl.nervatype_2 = (select id from groups where groupname='nervatype' and groupvalue='groups') and g.deleted=0 where p.deleted=0 and p.discount is not null and p.product_id = @id order by p.validfrom
